tool_description: Analyzes liability and indemnification clauses to assess exposure levels, coverage gaps, and potential unlimited liability scenarios.

liability_clauses.description: Array of liability and indemnification clause texts

contract_value.description: Total contract value in USD for liability context

party_role.description: Role in contract: vendor, client, contractor, or partner

insurance_coverage.description: Available insurance coverage amount in USD

liability_caps_required.description: Whether liability caps are required by company policy

error_messages: Empty liability clauses: Provide at least one liability clause for assessment.
Invalid contract value: Contract value must be a positive number.
Invalid party role: Use one of [vendor, client, contractor, partner].
Negative insurance coverage: Insurance coverage amount must be positive if specified.
Unlimited liability detected: Contract contains unlimited liability exposure which requires attention.
usage: Provide liability_clauses, contract_value, and party_role, optionally specify insurance_coverage and liability_caps_required. Returns detailed liability risk assessment.

liability_exposure.description: Overall liability exposure level: low, moderate, high, or unlimited

maximum_liability.description: Maximum potential liability amount in USD, or -1 if unlimited

coverage_gaps.description: Identified gaps in liability coverage or protection

indemnification_scope.description: Scope of indemnification obligations: narrow, standard, broad, or mutual

liability_recommendations.description: Specific recommendations for improving liability protection

insurance_adequacy.description: Whether available insurance coverage is adequate for identified liability exposure
